article: a philosopher and personal friend of pope john paul ii has been chosen to lead the italian people 's party -lrb- ppi -rrb- , successor to the tarnished christian democrats and the fourth major force in italian politics , party officials said saturday .
abstract: friend of pope to head christian democrats new party
